    • Field Detail

      • eModeFast

        public static final int eModeFast
        The fast mode uses the Windows GDI for rendering. This mode is generally faster than the accurate mode. Use this mode for high resolution (600 dpi).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • eModeAccurate

        public static final int eModeAccurate
        The accurate mode uses the Windows GDI+ for rendering. This mode allows for image filtering, sub-pixel rendering and anti-aliasing.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • eModeDirect

        public static final int eModeDirect
        This mode is deprecated.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
